QuestData.Title: WANTED: Ten'gor and Nol'ixwan
QuestData.Description: To any hunters worthy of the challenge: $b$bFind and defeat the dueling giant direhorn and devilsaur, named Nol'ixwan and Ten'gor. $b$bTheir never-ending battle has disrupted travel throughout Zuldazar. $b$bGlory for any that succeed!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Locked in perpetual battle with Ten'gor.
